stimulusHtml: Which of the following variable declarations are most appropriate to replace  /* missing declarations */  in the code segment?

features.html:
The following code segment is intended to calculate the circumference  circ  of a circle whose diameter  diam  is  1.5.  The circumference of a circle is equal to its diameter times  pi.

 

/* missing declarations */ 
circ = pi * diam;

choicesHtml:
int pi = 3.14159; 
int diam = 1.5; 
final int circ;

final int pi = 3.14159; 
int diam = 1.5; 
int circ;

final double pi = 3.14159; 
double diam = 1.5; 
double circ;

final double pi = 3.14159; 
final double diam = 1.5; 
final double circ = 0.0;
